    • Method Detail

      • createPhysical

        public static Physical createPhysical(java.lang.String hairColor,
                                      java.lang.String hairStyle,
                                      java.lang.String eyesColor,
                                      java.lang.String faceShape,
                                      int height,
                                      int weight,
                                      Gender gender,
                                      java.lang.String morphology,
                                      int age,
                                      java.lang.String language)
        Create a physical with the different option you want. If an option is null, it will be generate randomly.
        Parameters:
        hairColor - : If null, created randomly
        hairStyle - : If null, created randomly
        eyesColor - : If null, created randomly
        faceShape - : If null, created randomly
        height - : If null, created randomly
        weight - : If null, created randomly
        gender - : If null, created randomly
        morphology - : If null, created randomly
        age - : Used to generate a height randomly
        language - : The language you want to use for the creation. Uses the one of FileAccess.
        Returns:
        the generated physical

        public static int getHeight(int height,

        If needed, get a random height depending of the age and the gender
        Parameters:
        height - : If lesser than 0, will generate a new one
        age - : The generated height will depend of the age
